name: Cinderella Tip
description:
Cinderella Tip (aka Fake Residential House HQ, aka "Royal Citizen -1" )

Remy (F.R.) is an unemployed guy who, doing a favor for a friend (a Restaurant owner), does a delivery to the "King of the Island" a semi-hermit older guy.

When doing so, he became involved in a murder scene, in which he is considered the main suspect. Help him to get rid of all suspicions and, perhaps, find the culprit!

If you liked the game (or saw potential in it) , please follow me on Twitter

[Twitter pending...]

=============================================

Features:

-Third-person controller with movement, camera rotation, footsteps, and so forth

-A Marvelous House made by me (Kept in mind the "essence" of the Residential House HQ)

-[some] Ambient sounds

-Dialogue systems (notes, characters, and inspection commentary)

-Collectible Item

-Multiple languages for game: English (100%), Russian (85%), Spanish (100%), Simplified Chinese (75%) [% indicates how accurate, I think, the translations are in that language]

-Puzzles (Codes)

-Fully functional Menu

-Controller support

==============================================

Further notes:

I got into the jam because I plan to make a game in the future (this year actually), and I wanted to take the oportunity to showcase the RUUF (Rene's Unity Ultimate Framework), and also have some publicity. That being said, this game only showcases 15% of the RUUF's full potential, limiting to basics, such as dialogues, movement an interctions (100% includes weapons, much more functionalities, further optimizations,  multiple AI, and some errors you might encounter here are already fixed there). On a further note, the next game will have some historical relationship to this game. Code was made 100% by me, and house too, however, soundtrack, smaller assets such as furniture and other similar things were not made by me (credits in the game)

I do want to thank John Wolf for the oportunity in any case
